SqlOutput.Sql: (((COALESCE($!s0s!$.customnumber1__c, 0) * COALESCE($!s0s!$.customnumber2__c, 0))/POWER(CAST((CAST(COALESCE($!s0s!$.customnumber2__c, 0) AS VARCHAR)) AS DECIMAL(38,18)), COALESCE($!s0s!$.customnumber2__c, 0))) * POWER(COALESCE($!s0s!$.customnumber3__c, 0), COALESCE($!s0s!$.customnumber3__c, 0)))
SqlOutput.Guard: TRUNCATE(COALESCE($!s0s!$.customnumber3__c, 0))<>COALESCE($!s0s!$.customnumber3__c, 0) OR(COALESCE($!s0s!$.customnumber3__c, 0)<>0 AND LOG10(ABS(COALESCE($!s0s!$.customnumber3__c, 0)))*COALESCE($!s0s!$.customnumber3__c, 0)>38) OR NOT REGEXP_LIKE(REGEXP_REPLACE((CAST(COALESCE($!s0s!$.customnumber2__c, 0) AS VARCHAR)),'[0-9]+','0'),'^[+-]?(0|0\.|\.0|0\.0)([Ee][+-]?0)?$') OR TRUNCATE(COALESCE($!s0s!$.customnumber2__c, 0))<>COALESCE($!s0s!$.customnumber2__c, 0) OR(CAST((CAST(COALESCE($!s0s!$.customnumber2__c, 0) AS VARCHAR)) AS DECIMAL(38,18))<>0 AND LOG10(ABS(CAST((CAST(COALESCE($!s0s!$.customnumber2__c, 0) AS VARCHAR)) AS DECIMAL(38,18))))*COALESCE($!s0s!$.customnumber2__c, 0)>38) OR POWER(CAST((CAST(COALESCE($!s0s!$.customnumber2__c, 0) AS VARCHAR)) AS DECIMAL(38,18)), COALESCE($!s0s!$.customnumber2__c, 0))=0

TRUNCATE($!s0s!$.customnumber3__c)<>$!s0s!$.customnumber3__c OR($!s0s!$.customnumber3__c<>0 AND LOG10(ABS($!s0s!$.customnumber3__c))*$!s0s!$.customnumber3__c>38) OR NOT REGEXP_LIKE(REGEXP_REPLACE((CAST($!s0s!$.customnumber2__c AS VARCHAR)),'[0-9]+','0'),'^[+-]?(0|0\.|\.0|0\.0)([Ee][+-]?0)?$') OR TRUNCATE($!s0s!$.customnumber2__c)<>$!s0s!$.customnumber2__c OR(CAST((CAST($!s0s!$.customnumber2__c AS VARCHAR)) AS DECIMAL(38,18))<>0 AND LOG10(ABS(CAST((CAST($!s0s!$.customnumber2__c AS VARCHAR)) AS DECIMAL(38,18))))*$!s0s!$.customnumber2__c>38) OR POWER(CAST((CAST($!s0s!$.customnumber2__c AS VARCHAR)) AS DECIMAL(38,18)), $!s0s!$.customnumber2__c)=0
